## ThirdwebSDK.getToken() method

Get an SDK interface for an Token program

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getToken(address: string): Promise<Token>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address of the program |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Token](./solana.token.md)<!-- -->&gt;
